name: Well of Radiance
description: Creates a pool of Light that continuously heals allies and increases weapon damage.

name: Phoenix Dive
description: Fast dive with explosion that heals and damages enemies.

name: Chaos Reach

description: Summons an Arc Soul that fires at enemies automatically.

description: Hurls a massive sphere of Void energy that explodes on impact.

name: Void Sentinel
description: Creates a shield that blocks incoming damage.

description: Summons a staff that freezes enemies in large areas.

name: Shatter Blast

name: Needlestorm

name: Grapple
description: Deploy a grappling hook for mobility.

name: Sentinel Shield
description: Summons a shield for defense and offense.

name: Sentinel Strike
description: Lightning-infused strikes that chain to nearby enemies.

name: Sentinel Void
description: Creates Void traps that absorb and return damage.

name: Glacial Quake
description: Ground-pound attacks that freeze enemies.

name: Strand Grenade

name: Golden Gun
description: A flaming hand cannon with 6 precision shots.

name: Arcstaff
description: Summons an Arc staff for rapid melee attacks.

name: Shadowshot
description: Tether enemies, making them take more damage.
